unified deep learning framework.from sentence: In this paper , we proposed a unified deep learning framework for recognizing textual entailment which dose not require any feature engineering , or external resources .

basic model.from sentence: The basic model is based on building biL - STM models on both premises and hypothesis .

basic mean pooling encoder.from sentence: The basic mean pooling encoder can roughly form a intuition about what this sentence is talking about .

simple effective input strategy.from sentence: In addition , we introduced a simple effective input strategy that get ride of same words in hypothesis and premise , which further boosts our performance .
